description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Dropdown component.
label: Dropdown

label.label: Label

description.description: The description for this dropdown editor.

editable.description: Whether the options managed by this Dropdown Editor are editable.

selectedKeys.description: The key(s) that are selected for the Dropdown component.
selectedKeys.label: Selected Keys
